version_description:
This is a big update! We've been working for months to bring you:
NEW! Landscape mode
NEW! Swipe memory keys for advanced math
NEW! Swipe down on display to see full history
NEW! Upgrade to ad-free version from the handy menu
And it looks great on iPhone 6, 6+, and iPad. Enjoy!

- Fix minor issues reported by users.
